name: John Papa
desc: John sits in Florida, and travels a lot as part of the TIE program.   You can read his blogs on backlot and he enjoys Sandwiches and chips at lunch.

name: Brian Clark
desc: Brian sits in Florida, and often commutes around the Orlando area.  You'll find him posting on Yammer, and he'll often order Enchiladas at lunch.

name: Dave Solomon
desc: David sits in Florida.   He participates in multiple hack days when they are offered. He prefers seafood buffets at lunch.

name: David Elliott
desc: David sits in Florida.     He attended the Star Wars Premiere with WDPRT and posted photos to yammer.   David enjoys giant spiral ham for lunch.

name: Michael Callaghan
desc: Michael's office is in Florida.  Originally from New Hampshire, he enjoys Florida weather and not shoveling snow.  Michael enjoys ribeye steaks at lunch.

name: Troy Hamilton
desc: Troy's office is in Florida.   It has three walls.  Troy likes hot wings for lunch.

name: Tilak Mandadi
desc: Tilak is is sponsoring Developer Days as part of our WDPR T Continued Learning Strategy.

name: Sean Treat
desc: Sean volunteered to host the Speed Meeting at lunch during Dev Days and has participated in planning meetings for this year's event.

name: Diane Schaffer
desc: Diane is at Kirkman, and has been Executive Sponsor and Champion of many Developer Days.
